schema.name: date
schema.description: YYYY-MM-DD of the purchase in UTC time.

schema.name: sam_number
schema.description: Unique id (uuid) for customer identification corresponding to Salesforce ID.

schema.name: product
schema.description: String code for product, ex: CM11.

schema.name: quantity
schema.description: Number of units of the product in whole integers.

schema.name: transaction_type
schema.description: Type of the transaction, always equal to Transfer Order.
